content:
We have three tasks of high priority:

  • Improve the paper! https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/issues/189
  • Is it necessary that there are finitely many rows? https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/issues/143
  • Write a blueprint for cographicness. https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/issues/144

Anybody, please, claim a task if you can, or at least leave a comment.
Also feel free to invite new people and offer them authorship for helping the Seymour project!
We don't have to stick with only 11 authors.
